posts.post_title: Selling:   Old Judge Star Players (ALL GONE)
posts.post_content:
Posted By: Brian H (misunderestimated)
1.  Jack Glasscock SGC 80 SOLD (probably the best Shortstop between the prehistoric days of Geo. Wright and the group that came into their own in the mid-1890's:  Jennings, Dahlen and Geo. Davis) SOLD 

2.  Jimmy Ryan SGC 20 -- because of back damage --  SOLD  -- Ryan played 18  (1885-1900, 1902-1903) collecting 2502 hits and batting .306.

3.   Dave "Scissors" Foutz SGC A -- trimmed at the top I assume --SOLD  -- One of the great 2-way players in the history of the game. 
----------------------------------------
Postage w/insurance is included.  Paypal accepted without any additional charge.
----------------------------------------
The rule is whomever(or it is "whoever"?) emails me first at 
bhodes@rcn.com 
accepting these terms has priority -- not the first one to first post here or the first one to email me asking for more scans or something.
